description: Maximal run length in base 4 representation of n.
comments: Sequences A031942 (or A043090), A037977, A037978, A037979 list numbers for which a(n)=1, a(n)=2, a(n)=3, a(n)=4. - M. F. Hasler, Jul 23 2013
maple: mRunLen := proc(L)    if nops(L) = 0 then        0;    else        a := 1 ;        for i from 2 to nops(L) do            if op(i,L) = op(i-1,L) then                a := a+1 ;            else                a := max(a, procname([op(i..nops(L),L)])) ;                break;            end if;        end do:        a ;    end if ;end proc:A043278 := proc(n)    convert(n,base,4) ;    mRunLen(%) ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 26 2015
prog: (PARI) A043278(n, b=4)={my(m,c=1); while(n>0, n%b==(n\=b)%b && c++ && next; m=max(m, c); c=1); m} \\ - M. F. Hasler, Jul 23 2013
